byline.original: By BENJAMIN TOFF; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

docs.snippet: The parties and the event itself were plenty fun on Sunday, but as folks who followed along at home know, the Bagger did not have a good night when it came to the Oscar ballot. He got off to a lousy start, blowing the first two awards (damn that P...
docs.lead_paragraph: The parties and the event itself were plenty fun on Sunday, but as folks who followed along at home know, the Bagger did not have a good night when it came to the Oscar ballot. He got off to a lousy start, blowing the first two awards (damn that Penelope Cruz). And while he stormed back, taking 12 of the next 13 categories, the end game did him in (damn that Sean Penn and "Departures").
